sub_title: I can help you developing sustainable energy projects
summary:
I am specialized in developing sustainable energy projects: wind energy, solar energy , biomass and hydro power.
I have a full house on sustainable energy projects:
- solar energy in South Africa  (75 MW solar PV)
- wind energy in Costa Rica (50-100 MW wind energy)
- biomass in Senegal (150 - 300 kW biomass / steam engine)
- hydro power in Sulawesi (10 - 40 kW cross flow and pelton hydro power turbines)
My experience is in the field of project developement and project management.
I have also had education in auditing: process orrientated auditing. (KEMA and Lloyds Register Quality Assurance)

Specialties: project development, project management, system development of sustainable energy projects (solar, wind, biomass and hydro power)
